title: The Land
creator_credit: Robert Joseph Flaherty, Department of Agriculture and National Audio Visual Center
brief_description: Robert Flaherty’s images create an impressive study of the problems of American agriculture during the depression and the eventual ruin of vast tracts of land in the midwest. Looks at problems such as erosion, overproduction, mechanisation and the influx of migrant workers. Commentary: Russell Lord
